entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
